default: 4 large Bramley cooking apples, de-cored and scored
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Melt the butter in a small saucepan. Add the onions and cook them for about 6 minutes or until they are transparent. Add the herbs, breadcrumbs and seasoning, stirring well to combine everything.

Spoon the stuffing into the cavities of the apples. Place the apples into a dish, dot the top with butter and put into the oven for about 45-60 minutes. Serve as an accompaniment with pork or duck dishes.
title: Sage and onion stuffed apples
